question: What are the emerging technology trends in the healthcare industry according to company investments and engagements?

subtasks.task: Identify the companies operating in the healthcare industry and gather their core reference information including financial metrics and operational details.
Collect data on the strategic technology focus areas of the identified healthcare companies to analyze specific IT domains they are investing in.
Investigate current hiring details related to technology roles within healthcare companies to understand the skills and technologies that are in demand.
Review vendor product and technology details linked to healthcare companies to assess partnerships and technology adoption trends.
Analyze social media engagement metrics to evaluate how healthcare companies are promoting their technology initiatives and interacting with their audience.
